extendedInfo.description: Yalt - Yet another LED tool (HTC Sensation)This Application allows you to take Control over all LED in your Device.+Widget to toggle Button-Backlight and FlashlightIf an option is not available on your device it will be grayed out.Confirmed Working on:HTC Sensation

reviews.title: Works perfectly(NEEDS ROOT)
reviews.comment: It does what it says, I\'ve been using this app since it was on xda a while back. It needs root and that\'s probably why its not working for some
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Didn\'t work :(
reviews.comment: Interface looks nice, but all options were greyed out on samsung galaxy s2 sprint epic 4g touch
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: HTC sensation 4g, doesn\'t appear to do anything at all. Looks nice, just wish it worked..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Also LED flash permanent On
reviews.comment: Good . working on S4G needs auto button lights too. Thanks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Uninstalled but its still making my phone flash!! Help!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sorry it doesn\'t work!
reviews.comment: Nice interface. Doesn\'t seem to do anything on my Droid incredible 2 running gingerbread. Hope you can fix it!
reviews.author: A Google User
